[Intro]
[ch]G[/ch] [ch]B[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]Cm[/ch]

[Verse 1]
                     [ch]G[/ch]                              [ch]B[/ch]
When you were here before, couldn't look you in the eyes
                    [ch]C[/ch]                         [ch]Cm[/ch]
You're just like an angel, your skin makes me cry
                 [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]B[/ch]
You float like a feather in a beautiful world
             [ch]C[/ch]                          [ch]Cm[/ch]
I wish I was special, you're so fucking special

[Chorus] (play loud)
G (x3, very short)
          [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]B[/ch]
But I'm a creep, I'm a weirdo
                         [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]Cm[/ch]
What the hell am I doing here? I don't belong here

[Verse 2]
                   [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]B[/ch]
I don't care if it hurts, I wanna have control
                 [ch]C[/ch]                      [ch]Cm[/ch]
I want a perfect body, I want a perfect soul
              [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]B[/ch]
I want you to notice when I'm not around
                  [ch]C[/ch]                     [ch]Cm[/ch]
You're so fucking special, I wish I was special

[Chorus] (play loud)
G (x3, very short)
          [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]B[/ch]
But I'm a creep, I'm a weirdo
                         [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]Cm[/ch]
What the hell am I doing here? I don't belong here

[Bridge] (play loud)
            [ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]B[/ch]
Oooh, oooh, she's running out again...
[ch]C[/ch]                      [ch]Cm[/ch]                
She's running out, she run, run, run...
[ch]G[/ch]     [ch]B[/ch]
Ruuuuuuuun...
[ch]C[/ch]     [ch]Cm[/ch]
Ruuuuuuuuuuun...

[Verse 3] (play soft until the end)
                   [ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]B[/ch]
Whatever makes you happy, whatever you want
                  [ch]C[/ch]                     [ch]Cm[/ch]
You're so fucking special, I wish I was special

[Chorus]
          [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]B[/ch]
But I'm a creep, I'm a weirdo
                         [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]Cm[/ch]
What the hell am I doing here? I don't belong here
          [ch]G[/ch]
I don't belong here

Listen to song on youtube..

[Intro]
[ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]F/C[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]      
                    
[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]
Someone told me long ago
[ch]C[/ch]                                   [ch]G[/ch]
There's a calm before the storm, I know
                     [ch]C[/ch]  
And it's been coming for some time

[ch]C[/ch]
When it's over, so they say
[ch]C[/ch]                          [ch]G[/ch]
It'll rain a sunny day, I know
                   [ch]C[/ch]  
Shining down like water

[Chorus]
[ch]F[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]
I wanna know
         [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]C/B[/ch]      [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Am/G[/ch]
Have you ever seen the rain
[ch]F[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]
I wanna know
         [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]C/B[/ch]      [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Am/G[/ch]
Have you ever seen the rain
[ch]F[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]  
Coming down on a sunny day 

[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]
Yesterday and days before
[ch]C[/ch]                                [ch]G[/ch]
Sun is cold and rain is hard, I know
                    [ch]C[/ch] 
Been that way for all my time

[ch]C[/ch]
'Til forever on it goes
[ch]C[/ch]                                 [ch]G[/ch]
Thru the circle fast and slow, I know
                       [ch]C[/ch] 
And it can't stop, I wonder

[Chorus]
[ch]F[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]

[ch]F[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]
